amendment.description: To provide assistance for States with percentages of children with no health insurance coverage above the national average.
amendment.purpose: To provide assistance for States with percentages of children with no health insurance coverage above the national average.

action.text: Amendment SA 93 proposed by Senator Hutchison.

vote.text: Amendment SA 93 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 17 - 81. Record Vote Number: 30.
